piece.title: Stay Sharp App
piece.lilbrief: Gillette need a way to "nudge" men into changing razor blades more often. The idea must influence behaviour and intercept routine...
piece.bigbrief: Gillette's latest global research shows they need a new way of "nudging" men to change their blades more often. But how can you influence a modern man's traditional behaviour and intercept their grooming routine?

piece.title: V Free
piece.lilbrief: Vodacom need new ways to convey value & re-engage with the people of South Africa.
piece.bigbrief: Vodacom is the leading network operator (by market share) in a country where smartphone penetration leads the world (at >80%). But they're facing serious challenge from several tech startups who are doing different things. Vodacom needed new ideas to convey value, re-engage, & reconnect with the people of South Africa
